Class ec.ifc.app.ECControlGroupItem 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----netscape.application.View
           |
           +----netscape.application.ContainerView
                   |
                   +----ec.ifc.app.ECControlGroupItem
public class ECControlGroupItem
extends ContainerView
One item in a set managed by an ECControlGroup. This is the abstract superclass that adds some callbacks used by ECControlGroup to ContainerView. You will probably most often instantiate the subclass ECSimpleControlGroupItem, but you might also create your own subclasses.
See Also:
ECControlGroup, ECSimpleControlGroupItem

ECControlGroupItem()

getLabel()
Returns the text label that is optionally shown as part of this item.
layoutContents(int)
Called by ECControlGroup when the width or other conditions of this item change in such a way that this item needs to be laid out again.
setLabel(String)
Sets the text label that is optionally shown as part of this item.

ECControlGroupItem 
  public ECControlGroupItem()

getLabel 
  public abstract String getLabel()
Returns the text label that is optionally shown as part of this item. Subclasses should override to read this string from wherever it is stored (perhaps in a text field)
layoutContents 
  public abstract void layoutContents(int labelWidth)
Called by ECControlGroup when the width or other conditions of this item change in such a way that this item needs to be laid out again. labelWidth specifies how much horizontal space should be reserved for the label (if any). Subclasses should override to reposition subviews appropriately.
setLabel 
  public abstract void setLabel(String newLabel)
Sets the text label that is optionally shown as part of this item. Subclasses should override to store this string somwhere (perhaps in a text field)
